page.title: 12HOUSING-PLANS AND SERVICES.
page.content: {Ann}lives in an owned terraced house. A typical plan is :-upstairs there are three bedrooms,bathroom/toilet and an airing cupboard.Downstairs there is a hall, front room,living room and a kitchen.{Richards}lives in an owned semi-detached house,{Hannah}and{Rose live in semi-detached council houses. According to the{Shropshire County {Structure Plan}Shrewsbury needs 2,200 houses and the local plan for Shrewsbury will ensure that sufficient land becomes available.{Severn Trent {Water Authority}are responsible for connecting mains water and sewage pipes.{CONSUMPTION-June '85- No.Domestic Properties connected -3415 Metered Supply p.d.-224cub m @27.6p ea Unmeasured " " -1253cub m @18.9p per '1R.v.Underground Gas,Electricity and Telephone supplies are also connected to most houses and mapped.
